Rname: Must take weaker (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take only if taken piece is weaker than my taking piece (during first XX turns). In other cases I can take or not take

Rname: Must take (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I may capture any.

Rname: Must take weakest (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I must capture weakest target

Rname: Must take with strongest (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I must capture with my strongest piece

Rname: Take protected if stronger (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take only if my taking piece is stronger than piece taken and taken piece is protected (during first XX turns). In other cases I can take or not take.

Rname: Must take with pawns (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take with pawns (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I may capture any.

Rname: Must take unprotected or stonger (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take only if taken piece is stronger than my taking piece or if taken piece is unprotected (during first XX turns). In other cases I can take or not take

Rname: Must take strongest (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I must capture strongest target

Rname: Must take with weakest (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must take (during first XX turns). When more than one capture is available, I must capture with my strongest piece

Rname: I must attack (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must increase number of attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: I must attack or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must capture or increase number of attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: I must attack if protected >YY (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must increase number of attacks if my piece moves to square protected by more than YY my pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: I must attack if protected >YY or capture stronger (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must capture a stronger piece or increase number of attacks if my piece moves to square protected by more than YY my pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: I must attack if not attacked (XX turns)
Rdesc: I must increase number of attacks if my moved piece is not attacked (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture stronger pieces than my capturing piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture from check (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture if I am checked and can escape without capturing (during first XX turns)

Rname: King can't capture from check (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture with king if I am checked and can escape without capturing (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture first (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture until you capture first of my pieces or pawns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture unprotected (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture your pieces, which are not protected

Rname: Can't capture stronger protected (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture your stronger pieces, which are protected (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can take only weakest (XX turns)
Rdesc: If I can capture, I have to capture smallest piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture with captured piece type (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture with piece type, which was just captured by you (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger piece with captured piece type (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture stronger piece with piece type, which was just captured by you (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture YY times in a row (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture if I captured in my YY previous turns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture YY times in a row with same piece type (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture if I captured with this piece type in my YY previous turns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger YY times in a row (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture a stronger piece if I captured in my YY previous turns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger YY times in a row with same piece type (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture a stronger piece if I captured with this piece type in my YY previous turns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture YY times in a row with same piece (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture if I captured with this piece in my YY previous turns (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture capturer (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture your piece, which just captured my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger capturer (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture your stronger piece, which just captured my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture after your capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture if in previous move you captured my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture stronger after your capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture stronger piece if in previous move you captured my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can capture only after your capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can only capture if in previous move you captured my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't capture after checking (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot capture after checking (during first XX turns)

Rname: Remove your attack if >YY (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to remove your attack if more than YY pieces attack my piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Remove your attack not capture if >YY (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to remove your attack, but not capture your piece - if you attack my piece with more than YY pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't move into >YY attacks (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move into your attack if you will attack me by more than YY pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't move into >YY attacks without capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move into your attack if you will attack me by more than YY pieces, except if I capture (during first XX turns)

Rname: Decrease your attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must result in decrease in number of your attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Decrease your attack count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or result in decrease in number of your attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Minimize your attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of your attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min your attack count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or should minimize the number of your attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min your decrementing attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of your attacks if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min your decrementing attack count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either a capture or should minimize the number of your attacks if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't increase your attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must not result in increase in number of your attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move into attack (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move into your attack (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move only pawns until you capture YY value (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can move only pawns (during first XX turns) or until you capture pieces with aggregate value YY

Rname: Can't move if attacked >YY (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move piece, which is attacked by more than YY pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move only attacked >YY (XX turns)
Rdesc: If you attack one of my pieces with more than YY pieces, I can move only that piece (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move only attacked >YY without capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: If you attack one of my pieces with more than YY pieces (during first XX turns), I can move only that piece, but cannot capture

Rname: Can move only YY random piece types (XX turns)
Rdesc: During XX first turns YY types of pieces are selected randomly, which I can move

Rname: Randomly disable YY% pieces (XX turns)
Rdesc: YY% of possible moving pieces are randomly disabled (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't move same piece YY times in a row (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move the same piece YY times in a row (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't move same piece type YY times in a row (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move the same piece type YY times in a row (during first XX turns)

Rname: Must move each piece type every YY turns
Rdesc: I have to move each piece type at least once every YY turns

Rname: Must move King every YY turns
Rdesc: I have to move King at least once every YY turns

Rname: Must move Pawn every YY turns
Rdesc: I have to move Pawn at least once every YY turns

Rname: Must move Queen every YY turns
Rdesc: I have to move Queen at least once every YY turns

Rname: Can't move if next to >YY your pieces (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move piece, which is next to more than YY your pieces, but I can capture with it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Random move (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move is replaced with a random move (during first XX turns)

Rname: Pawns move only 1 square (XX turns)
Rdesc: My pawns can move only one square (during first XX turns)

Rname: Randomly disable YY% moves (XX turns)
Rdesc: YY% of possible moves are randomly disabled (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't move to next to >YY your pieces (XX turns)
Rdesc: I cannot move piece to sqyare, which is next to more than YY your pieces, but I can capture this square (during first XX turns)

Rname: Must move away if next to >YY your pieces or total >ZZ (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move piece, which is next to more than YY your pieces (or if number of total close pairs is more than ZZ), to a less close position (but I can capture with it) (during first XX turns)

Rname: Bishop can move only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Bishop can move only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer), but can capture (during first XX turns)

Rname: Rook can move only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Rook can move only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer), but can capture (during first XX turns)

Rname: Queen can move only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Queen can move only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer), but can capture (during first XX turns)

Rname: Bishop can move or capture only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Bishop can move or capture only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer) (during first XX turns)

Rname: Rook can move or capture only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Rook can move or capture only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer) (during first XX turns)

Rname: Queen can move or capture only YY-ZZ squares (XX turns)
Rdesc: Queen can move or capture only from YY to ZZ squares (not shorter or longer) (during first XX turns)

Rname: Free back lines or capture if invaded (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move away from backlines if you invaded it with queen or rook (during first XX turns)

Rname: Stockfish best move (depth YY, skill ZZ)
Rdesc: Best move is chosen by Stockfish algorithm with depth YY and skill ZZ (possible values 0-20)

Rname: Stockfish best available move (depth YY)
Rdesc: Best available move is chosen by Stockfish algorithm with depth YY

Rname: Stockfish ZZ best moves (depth YY)
Rdesc: Only ZZ best available moves are allowed by Stockfish algorithm (depth YY)

Rname: Prohibit Stockfish best move (depth YY)
Rdesc: I cannot use best available move, which is selected by Stockfish algorithm (depth YY)

Rname: Prohibit Stockfish best moves (depth YY, rating <ZZ)
Rdesc: I cannot use best available moves, which are selected by Stockfish algorithm (depth YY) while next best move is not lower than ZZ in rating

Rname: SimpleChessAI best move (depth YY)
Rdesc: Best move is chosen by Simple chess AI algorithm with depth YY

Rname: SimpleChessAI best move bad position (depth YY)
Rdesc: Best move is chosen by Simple chess AI algorithm with depth YY (bad positions are preferred)

Rname: Move to protection (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can move only to square, which is protected by my other pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to protection or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can either capture or move to square, which is protected by my other pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to max protection (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can move only to square, which is protected by maximum number of my pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to max protection or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I can capture or move to square, which is protected by maximum number of my pieces (during first XX turns)

Rname: Increase protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must result in increase in number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Increase protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or result in increase in number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Max protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must max out the number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Max incrementing protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must max out the number of my protections if I can increase it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Max protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either a capture or should max out the number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Max incrementing protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either a capture or should max out the number of my protections if I can increase it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Remove rules if score <YY
Rdesc: All limiting rules are disabled if my Stockfish evaluated score falled below YY in my previous turn

Rname: Remove rules if material <YY
Rdesc: All limiting rules are disabled if my material balance is below YY

Rname: Remove rules after you capture (YY turns)
Rdesc: All limiting rules are disabled during YY turns after you capture my piece

Rname: Remove rules after I capture (YY turns)
Rdesc: All limiting rules are disabled during YY turns after I capture your piece

Rname: Decrease protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must result in decrease in number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Decrease protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or result in decrease in number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or should minimize the number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min decrementing protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of my protections if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min decrementing protect count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either a capture or should minimize the number of my protections if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't increase protect count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must not result in increase in number of my protections (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worse position (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is worse then my current (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worst position (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is worst (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worst position if decreasing (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is worst if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worse position or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is worse then my current (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worst position or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is worst (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to worst position if decreasing or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is worst if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to better position (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is better then my current (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to best position (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is best (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to best position if increasing (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to move to position, which evaluation is best if I can increase it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to better position or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is better then my current (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to best position or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is best (during first XX turns)

Rname: Move to best position if increasing or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: I have to capture or move to position, which evaluation is best if I can increase it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Decrease attack count if your>YY or total>ZZ (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must result in decrease in number of my attacks if number of your attacks >YY or numer of my+your attacks >ZZ (during first XX turns)

Rname: Decrease attack count or capture if your>YY or total>ZZ (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or result in decrease in number of my attacks if number of your attacks >YY or numer of my+your attacks >ZZ (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of my attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min attack count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either capture or should minimize the number of my attacks (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min decrementing attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must minimize the number of my attacks if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Min decrementing attack count or capture (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must be either a capture or should minimize the number of my attacks if I can decrease it (during first XX turns)

Rname: Can't increase attack count (XX turns)
Rdesc: My move must not result in increase in number of my attacks (during first XX turns)
